        ConnectionStatus getStatus()
        Returns the value of the 'Status' attribute. The default value is "UNDEFINED". The literals are from the enumeration deviceapi.connection.ConnectionStatus.

        If the meaning of the 'Status' attribute isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...
